title: The Boy from Taurianova
brief_description: Rocco arrived from Calabria in 1962 at the age of 19 and immediately started his working life on a potato farm in Ballarat. He lovingly dedicates this story of his life to his daughter Connie. Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).
